name: if (Todist)
description:
Description

The ultimate test for a scientist repressed by his work will lead him to success.

Investigate his life to get him on the right path! And don't fail...

Controls

E: Interact

Shift: Run

LMB: Inspect  interactable object

0: Return to MainMenu

Credits

3D Assets:

Unreal Marketplace: Free Furniture Pack, ModernCuty Environment, OldBrick House, Soul: Cave

Quixel Megascans
